pages.text: $(li)The Lumbering enchantment $(l:patchouli:weapons/wooden_axe)Axe$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:tools/quark/pickarang)Pickarang$(/l).$(br)$(li)This enchantment allows to you cut down whole trees.$(br)$(li)You must to be sneaking while you are cutting the tree to apply this effect.
pages.title: Lumbering

pages.text: $(li)It can be created combining a $(l:patchouli:weapons/gold_axe)Golden Axe$(/l) with a $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/book_and_quill)Book and Quill$(/l) in an $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/anvil)Anvil$(/l).
